summary: This document is an email chain from August 14, 2019, discussing the manipulation of a Victim Notification System (VNS) letter for case 2018R01618 (Epstein). The SDNY U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman wants a specific, truncated two-paragraph notice sent to registrants, and staff are trying to figure out how to remove standard closing paragraphs from the notifications.

keyFacts: U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman gave specific instructions for the Victim Notification System (VNS) letter for the Epstein case (2018R01618) to contain only two paragraphs: the introduction and added text.
Staff were attempting to figure out how to manually remove the standard VNS closing paragraphs from letters sent to registrants.
The email chain indicates the notice was considered 'timely,' suggesting urgency in sending out the modified notification.
